name: OpenGameArt Movie Video Game
description:
After defeating the silver faced wizard some time ago, Andy has given up adventuring. He settled in the 1 bit part of town. Unfortunately his friend drags him into a larger conflict. Can you protect the diversity of artistic styles in the video game world or will everything be transformed into the Liberated Pixel Cup style?

Use the arrow keys to move. Ctrl to interact with things or continue through dialog. Alt to bring up to the main menu to save.

Combat has been disabled as it is not ready unfortunately. Many other planned features are also not available.
